alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 6:33PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bannock, central Power and southwestern Bingham Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 631 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Neeley, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph, pea size hail, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... American Falls, Neeley, American Falls Reservoir, Aberdeen, Springfield, Pocatello Airport, Sterling and Massacre Rocks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near American Falls Reservoir, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region
